page.title: 01INTRODUCTION TO HOLMER GREEN
page.content: Holmer Green and Hazlemere are about 4 miles away from High Wycombe.Holmer Green used to be a cherry growing village but most of these orchards have been sold to building companies and are now estates and roads.The Park Estate is the largest estate in either Holmer Green or Hazlemere and was woods until 15 years ago.On the Park Estate is a shopping area which is the largest one in either area.With the orchards and the woods disappearing both areas have grown in size and popularity.Holmer Green has a large sports club and provides facilities for cricket,tennis ,football and squash.Two attractions in Holmer Green are the pond and the common.On the common every year the fete and the fair are held.Farming is a predominant occupation of the area comprising of arable,dairy and poultry Industry is based on small workshops.
